answers.answer: Have you been tested for diabetes??

Sounds like someone needs to get to their doctor's office and fast! There's too many illnesses out there to list when it comes to the swelling of the body parts you named, and you need to get some tests done, that's for sure! If you don't have a family doctor or insurance, go to the ER. By law, they cannot turn you down because you don't have insurance.Good luck to you!
are you on Lyrica? I had adverse reactions

question: My legs, feet, and ankles swell up and im in constant pain. The pain gets so bad i literally pass out even hard to breathe. The swelling was starting to disapate but its come back and dont know why. I need some help to young to have so much pain. Can anyone help me.
title: constant pain--dont know what it is?
